author: @nillionnetwork
text:
The Roundtable is going to be a bit more nilGPT coded this time around.

Join us to learn how nilGPT changes the game for private chatbots.

Set a reminder below 👇 https://t.co/Act9tDsgW3

author: @nillionnetwork
text:
nilGPT is now live for everyone.

While other chatbots ask for your trust, we built one that doesn’t need it.

Watch this 👇 https://t.co/AXhoiNH4gJ https://t.co/OURRGemADI

author: @nillionnetwork
text:
Nillion’s first ever Korean community meet up happening Monday August 11th.

See you all there!

닐리언의 첫 번째 한국 커뮤니티 밋업이
8월 11일 월요일에 열립니다.

그때 뵙겠습니다. https://t.co/pATBxNnaso
